appendix.title: Bug reporting Bugzilla BugBugzilla
appendix.para: UCS is neither error free nor feature complete. Issues are tracked using Bugzilla at .
Search for existing entries before opening new reports.
Include the version info: ucr search --brief ^version/.
Provide enough information to help us reproduce the bug.

Search and ask for help. In addition to our support team many of our partners are also present there. Your questions might also help other users while you may profit from issues already solved for other users.
